alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 5:24PM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Mendocino County through 600 PM PDT... At 523 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Willits, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Brief periods of heavy rain could cause water to pond. Locations impacted include... Willits. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northwestern Mendocino Interior; Southeastern Mendocino Interior; Southwestern Mendocino Interior
